name: BattlePassHelper
0:
”Alexa, open Battle Pass Helper”
”Where is the Battle Star?”
”Alexa, ask Battle Pass Helper what are the challenges for this week”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: battle pass helper
des:
- Season Battle Pass Challenges (updated weekly)

This skill tells you all the Weekly Challenges & Battle Tier Rewards available in the Season 7 of Battle Pass of Fortnite Battle Royale. Every week for Season 7... Fortnite introduces new challenges that players can complete to earn extra XP & Battle Stars.

- Seasons Secret Battle Star Locations Guide (updated weekly)

This skill will show you how to find the Fortnite Season Secret Battle Stars to earn free Battle Pass Tiers and the Secret Banners from the hints from the secret banner loading screens of the challenges! 

Examples of phrases you can say to interact with this skill:

- Where is the battle star?
- Where is the location of the battle star for week 1/2/3/4...
- What are the challenges for this week?
- What are the challenges of last week?
- What are the challenges for week 1/2/3/4...
- Where is the battle star of the last week?

Please provide us with your feedback so we can improve this skill.

Thank you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
